reviewText:
It took me nearly 20 years to realize this... Voltron is the second coming of christ.

sure, he may be in animated form, but he is truely the son of god. He exudes all the virtues of christ and even improves upon them. I reccommend you buy this video, it is like looking into the face of god.

I used to watch Voltron as a kid. It's a fun and entertaining show. I'm glad I purchased this video for memory value however I was hoping Prince Lotor would be in it. Unfortunatley he doesn't make an appearance. This one is all Princess Alura.
